name: StoryWorld
0:
”Alexa, open Story World.”
”Alexa, Ask Story World to tell me a Robot story.”
”Alexa, Ask Story World to play Goldilocks and the three bears.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: story world
des:
Check out our growing selection of stories. All told by Alexa. 

Choose a story.
You could ask for a story about:
A Robot
A Princess
A Detective
An Astronaut
A Cheetah
Lots more to choose from and more being added.

Name the Characters.
You could use your own name for the main character in the story or you can create your own little world with all characters having different names. You decide!

Alexa will add a little bit of her personality to each story. Some will have sound effects in them. 

CLASSIC STORIES:
Little Red Riding Hood
Jack and the Beanstalk
Goldilocks and the three bears
The Three Little Pigs
Just say, play Little Red Riding Hood, when in the skill.

SCREEN DEVICES: (echo spot, echo show, fire tv)
Stories include basic illustrations and a Karaoke style reading from Alexa.
*A couple of the stories may not have illustrations (come back later and they could have been added).

FEEDBACK:

Positive feedback? Yay! Hit that review button and write a 5 star review telling me what you liked. It will make my day and give me the energy to keep making more content for the skill.

Negative feedback? Bummer! I will do my best to fix the issue. Use this Link: 
https://forms.gle/tSi6QPY44Efrwvbw6
Fill out the form and I will see what I can do to help you.

Hope you enjoy!

Hugo
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
